data.text: @EWoodhouse7 @KFF Cal academy of sciences still has COVID restrictions on kids, with no plans to end them that I've seen.

@EWoodhouse7 @KFF California hasn't even ended the state of emergency.

This is crazy.

I don't know how anyone could make this claim with a straight face.

Huge school districts are still saying they're going to continue masking kids here.

Masks in libraries, and government buildings.
@EWoodhouse7 @KFF As long as there is a “state of emergency” there is no normal.
@EWoodhouse7 @KFF Also, they haven't returned to normal.  San Diego just announced that masks are still required in school due to the high number of current cases.
@EWoodhouse7 @KFF As did GA, SC, AL, and MS. https://t.co/FbQ3GxwvGm
@EWoodhouse7 @KFF Florida returned to normal. California announced an approach to it.
@EWoodhouse7 @KFF Meanwhile IN with a GOP governor is content to let this go on FOREVER to get the $$$.
@EWoodhouse7 @KFF Florida officially ceased to exist once the mass extinction event failed to happen https://t.co/wfyjSz85Aw
